text: Pen anɨb ak nɨgɨm. Binɨb ogɨnap kɨli binɨb kubal okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨgun agɨl, ñɨg pakɨpal. Taynen anɨgɨpal? Anɨgenɨgabal, tɨtay dɨl binɨb kubal okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨgabal? Nɨbi ogɨnap apɨm, Binɨb kubal okok ma tɨkjakɨnɨgabal apɨm. Ak nɨm, binɨb kumɨl tɨkjakɨnɨgel tek ma yɨbɨl lenɨgab, binɨb ogɨnap taynen binɨb kubal okok kɨlop gɨñɨnɨgun agɨl, ñɨg pakɨpal?
